programme.title: Armour Of God

programme.desc: After a group of criminals manage to escape while being transported, the police decided to regroup a special team which consists of prisoners to help track and return them to prison.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A life-changing story of a man who has lived as a loner his entire life. Jae Shik begins to live together with a child with a hearing-visual disability, as they change each other's lives and try to find a way to communicate.

programme.title: The Row
programme.desc: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.

programme.desc: Two women with related experiences of the unknown phantasm and auditory hallucination in a closed school bathroom.

programme.title: Wind River

programme.title: Misbehavior

programme.title: The Wedding Year

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: A drama about a man who would do anything for money becoming friends with a child who is then taken hostage.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Living your life at night can present extreme challenges - and massive opportunities. In this world without light, danger lurks around every corner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: In between some cocktail-tasting pit stops, Adam Liaw discovers some of the finest desserts in Singapore, from homemade Peranakan sweet treats to a sophisticated dessert bar.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: The Presidents

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless, the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must develop a plan to outwit this dangerous new enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him “Juicy Booty.”

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit; Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Power Outage – Part 3: Escape from Scare School Things worsen when a leprechaun, Razznik, steals the magical cleptor that now holds all of Scare School's powers. Power Outage – Part 4: The Final Battle On a hunt for ghostly powers, the evil leprechaun orders Deedstown to hand over Casper's uncles, OR ELSE.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.desc: When an assault at gunpoint is witnessed through a neighboring window, the squad scrambles to locate the victim to confirm she's safe; a threat to extort the victim's family leads to a shocking suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26
programme.desc: Benson investigates a string of sexual assaults targeting local female psychiatrists; the squad celebrates a promotion.

programme.title: Chicago Med S10
programme.desc: When a commuter ship capsizes, our ED finds itself underwater as they struggle to treat the influx of new patients and deal with the bold new employees taking charge.

programme.title: Filthy Fortunes (S1)
programme.desc: Matt hunts for rare liquor, hand-rolled cigars and vintage drums in two California hoards. A baseball pennant misprint could be a huge score.

programme.title: Fritz Meinecke - Facing The Unknown (S1)
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of the survivors of Flight 571, a journey across the Andes!

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: A rookie miner gets trapped down a mine shaft. A dust storm forces the Blacklights to reluctantly return to the failed Land of Promise money pit.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: The Misfits, Angel Dempsey and rookie miner, Cody Polglase, must find an opal king stone for a bespoke pendant order. Oscar and Luca are forced above ground.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: Slim Pickings’ efforts to recycle precious dam water are derailed. The Blacklighters scrounge for any last opal in their Land of Promise Claim.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: Sam smashes opal with a jackhammer in the Bushmen’s mine. Plus, Rod and Les make a wager that will force the loser to wear one of Sam’s pink shirts.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: The Cheals' dreams of expanding their Opal Empire with partner Mark Bressan are crushed by the reality of juggling two mines.

programme.title: Belly Of The Beast Bigger And Bloodier
programme.desc: Join Dr. Austin Gallagher and his fearless team as they deploy a 29-foot whale decoy to attract and study massive great whites in New Zealand.

programme.title: Fish Or Die (S1)
programme.desc: The crew travels to the Land Down Under where Aboriginal guides will take them to a Barra fisherman's paradise.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs (S9)
programme.desc: Mike Rowe shows us where our food comes from, harvesting caviar from the muddy Mississippi River. Later, Mike brings his parents to work.

programme.title: Building Off The Grid (S7)
programme.desc: An Indiana farming family battles snow, wind and freezing temperatures to create a grain bin retreat on their working farm before the season begins.

programme.title: Super Dad (S2)
programme.desc: Taylor helps a former professional dancer create an outdoor theatre space where he can share his love of dance with his son and the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Super Dad (S2)
programme.desc: Taylor helps a father of eight build a fantasyland-inspired fort in his backyard, complete with a 40-foot slide that his kids can play on year-round.

programme.title: How Silk Railroad Works (S1)
programme.desc: This episode explores the international exchange of goods across China, Kazakhstan and Germany via the silk rail road.

programme.title: Harpoon Hunters (S1)
programme.desc: As Joe and Tyler fight for the top spot, dark horse Niko tries to steal it. But everything comes down to the final weigh-ins at the dock.

programme.title: Reality Ranis Of The Jungle (S1)
programme.desc: The money challenge yields an unexpected twist, dramatically altering the game. Two strong queens are nominated for the survival challenge.

programme.title: Gold Rush (S15)

programme.title: Rehab Addict Rescue (S1)

programme.title: Restoration Road With Clint Harp (S1)
programme.desc: Craftsman Clint Harp helps turn a 1743 pre-Revolutionary War stone inn that once housed George Washington into a beautiful, custom home in Texas.

programme.title: Restoration Road With Clint Harp (S1)
programme.desc: Clint Harp heads to a Montana ranch to see how a 270-year-old Dutch barn from Upstate New York is rebuilt into a working, 18th-century grist mill.

programme.title: Restoration Road With Clint Harp (S1)

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Extreme Ends

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing

Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: The two adventurers follow the mountaineer deep into the remote areas of Jiri Mountain. They experience a feast with makgeolli (Korean rice wine) and local mountain folk.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: They meet the finest biker of Jiri Mountain, a poet who fled city life to live in the mountains. From this poet, who captures photos of stars and flowers, the two actors learn poetry.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: Nam-gil and Sang-yoon arrive at the end of Korea, at the beautiful Mihwangsa Temple in Haenam, with a stunning view of the South Sea. They spend a day at the temple, with the head monk.

programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Pusoy Dos
programme.desc: It is non-stop laughter as Janno Gibbs and Dennis Padilla got together as Billy and Jack, modern-day Robin Hoods who engaged in petty scums to earn money for the upkeep of a day care center for indigent children.

programme.title: Macario Durano
programme.desc: When a corrupt police captain and his henchmen framed up Durano for a crime he did not commit. He then escaped from prison with revenge foremost in his mind.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as "bad boy" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Pikoy Goes to Malaysia
programme.desc: Tribal customs commands Pikoy to get married. But the union is against his will. He neglects his bride and humiliates his family. As punishment, he is banished from the tribe and forbidden to speak until he is ready to submit himself to the rules.

programme.title: Lipa "Arandia" Massacre
programme.desc: In the movie, Vilma played the role of Helen Arandia, who was brutally murdered along with her two daughters in Lipa, Batangas. The movie is not a massacre movie per se but which main thrust is on the beautiful love story of the couple.

programme.title: Send in the Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Bahala Na VS Sputnik
programme.desc: "Bahala na" and "Sigue-Sigue Sputnik" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood returns as Dirty Harry Callahan in this hard-edged thriller. Now no holds are barred when Dirty Harry goes into action.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Sports Scene

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Zoom in
programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. The weekly program zooms in on the details of trending news items and zooms out to give viewers the bigger picture. With in-depth analysis and current perspective, Zoom in takes you on a journey beyond the daily headlines.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a witness sees a nightclub owner jump to his death from his fifth-floor condo, the case is seemingly open and shut; that is until Dr. Jennifer Nara's autopsy reveals shocking new evidence.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a woman is brutally murdered just a week before her wedding, detectives interrogate three possible suspects, including her fiancé.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman fights for her life when her estranged husband starts shooting at her. A young mother finds herself in a terrifying situation when her brakes stop working.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman calls 911 while her family is held hostage by armed home invaders. Police rush to rescue a woman trapped in her burning car. A kidnapper tries to steal a mother's young children at a gas station.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita, pagtukoy ng mga elemento ng kuwento at pagsagot ng mga tanong tungkol dito.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 100,000. These also teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the parts of a paragraph, different resources, and significant details of different text types. These also talk about various ways of identifying the meaning of words.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pagkakakilanlan ng bansa ayon sa mga katangiang heograpikal gamit ang mapa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on grouping different materials based on their properties. These episodes also discuss the changes that materials undergo when exposed to certain conditions.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pangngalan, panghalip, magagalang na pananalita, at mga sanggunian. Pag-uusapan din dito ang pagsagot sa mga tanong, pabibigay ng hinuha, opinyon, solusyon, pagsunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari, at pagsusuri ng maikling pelikula.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the four fundamental operations involving fractions and decimals.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about analyzing images, interpreting the meaning of visual media, and making co ections between information viewed and personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa bahagi ng Pilipinas sa globalisasyon batay sa lokasyon nito sa mundo gamit ang mga kasanayang pangheograpiya at ang ambag ng malayang kaisipan sa pag-usbong ng nasyonalismong Pilipino.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the different types of mixtures and their characteristics and the different techniques to separate mixtures.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at pagsusulat ng tula, bugtong, sawikain, talata, karunungang-bayan, at pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of factors of polynomials, rational algebraic expressions, linear equations and inequalities in two variables, systems of linear equations and inequalities in two variables and linear functions.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use modals, adverbs, adjectives and nouns. These videos also focus on determining the meaning of words and expressions and citing sources.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa interaksiyon ng tao sa kaniyang kapaligiran na nagbigay-daan sa pag-usbong ng mga sinaunang kabihasnan na nagkaloob ng mga pamanang humubog sa pamumuhay ng kasalukuyang henerasyon.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about Newton’s three laws of motion, force, power, and different kinds of energy. These also teach the propagation of sound, properties and characteristics of visible light, heat and temperature, and the effects of heat on the body, and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga mitolohiya, parabula, at nobela. Ipinapaliwanag din dito ang wastong paggamit ng pokus ng pandiwa at panghalip, paggamit ng angkop na hudyat sa pagsunud-sunod ng mga pangyayari.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of sequences, polynomials and polynomial equations.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use information from various resources, determine the effect of textual aids, and analyzing materials viewed. These videos also focus on evaluating texts.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sanhi at implikasyon ng mga hamong pangkapaligiran upang maging bahagi ng pagtugon na makapagpapabuti sa pamumuhay ng tao.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the relationship among the locations of volcanoes, earthquake epicenters, and mountain ranges.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala sa sarili bilang Pilipino gamit ang konsepto ng pagpapatuloy at pagbabago.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pagsasabi ng mensahe, paksa o tema ng patalastas at kuwento. Tinuturo din ng mga palabas na ito ang tungkol sa pagsulat ng parirala at pangungusap.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 1000, ordinal numbers up to 20th, and money up to PhP100. These videos also teach addition of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different sounds, the alphabet, elements of the story, and action words. These also discuss the use of proper and common nouns and a and an.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang kahalagahan ng kinabibilangang komunidad.
